title: MCPC 1.4.2水桶服务端版本一览
author: zhangzhen38195
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhangzhen38195 于 2013-5-10 18:35 编辑 

MCPC是什么？
它是类似水桶端的服务端，既能够安装插件到你的服务端上，又能安装支持多人游戏的mod到服务端上。




由于作者太懒，只能大家去自己整合：
.externalToolBuilders

builds

lib

patches_to_bukkit

patches_to_vanilla

src

util

.classpath

.gitignore

.project

forgeNameChanges.patch

forge_to_bukkit_patch.patch

import log.txt

readme.txt

server-mappings-bukkit.srg

server-mappings-mcp.srg


作者说：
THE MANUAL BUILD TODO LIST

Make a bin folder where you build ur files from eclipse or build script.
Then turn output folder scrubbing off from eclipse.
Next extract the whole bukkit into the bin folder.

!! Then delete the com\/google folder !! because otherways it will load
those libs and FML wont work on old ones.

If you plan on making a jar then edit the meta info and remove the sealed tags.


FOR DEBUG RUN
Just set the working dir manually to something else. like MCP-1.4\/debug was for me.

RUNNING IT
java -classpath lib\/*.jar;. -jar mcpc.jar

nuff said that
翻译之后：
手动创建待办事项列表做一个bin文件夹在你建立你的文件从Eclipse或构建脚本。然后将输出文件夹从Eclipse擦洗。下提取出完整的bukkit为bin文件夹。！！然后删除COM /谷歌文件夹！因为你将负载！这些LIBS和FML在旧的坏了。如果你计划做一个罐子，然后编辑Meta信息并拆下密封标签。调试运行只要设置工作目录手动的东西。像mcp-1.4 \ /调试是我。运行它java -classpath lib\/*.jar;. -jar mcpc.jarnuff said that


PS：本帖可以关闭并挂上过期图章，已全部整合完毕
源地址：https://github.com/alphaest/MCPC-1.4
